Posts.EditableText: Hi, I'm looking for Beta Testers for a small game I hope to turn into an app for Ipad. I need to see if people can break it and find any bugs I've missed. If interested, you can pm or email me at rjlittlec@juno.com. I've eliminated as many bugs as I could find. Hopefully there shouldn't be any. LDS Quest - A small and quirky Mormon game of the sane and supernatural. Rated G for General. In LDS Quest, You can learn how to: Exercize charity Gain salvation Receive the Gifts of the Holy Ghost Gain faith to move mountains! (Well, at least one.) Meet angels! Commune with Deity! Overcome the adversary! Perform miracles! Discover wonders seldom experienced in modern times! And find out what happens after you enter the New and Everlasting Covenant. Be careful though, you can lose everything right up through your very last choice!

Hi,

I'm looking for Beta Testers for a small game I hope to turn into an app for Ipad. I need to see if people can break it and find any bugs I've missed. If interested, you can pm or email me at rjlittlec@juno.com. I've eliminated as many bugs as I could find. Hopefully there shouldn't be any.

LDS Quest - A small and quirky Mormon game of the sane and supernatural. Rated G for General.

In LDS Quest, You can learn how to:
Exercize charity
Gain salvation
Receive the Gifts of the Holy Ghost
Gain faith to move mountains! (Well, at least one.)
Meet angels!
Commune with Deity!
Overcome the adversary!
Perform miracles!
Discover wonders seldom experienced in modern times!
And find out what happens after you enter the New and Everlasting Covenant.

Be careful though, you can lose everything right up through your very last choice!
